alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Early; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Decatur, Miller, southwestern Baker, southeastern Early and northeastern Seminole Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Colquitt to near Donalsonville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Iron City, Damascus, Brinson, Jakin, Ausmac, Babcock, Little Hope, Mayhaw, Decatur Co A/P, Boykin, Mimsville, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P, Bellview, Davis Park, Hoggard Mill, Lela and Eldorendo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
